Users.about: Methods to work with User object: get, create, manipulate

Token.about: Control access key or create new one

Test.about: Methods to check diferent dalue and functionality

Classes.about: Objects having exact propreties everywhere in API

Global_Vars.about: Parameters which work everywhere in API and can modify the answer

Contacts.about: Contacts section works like a friends list. It unlocks more methods to interact with users

Messages.about: With messages now users can contact each other: exchanging text and attachments in private and multi-user chats
